testcase.name: User able to login with valid UsarName and valid PassWoard
testcase.system-out: Given Open Browser..........................................................passed And Enter Url "https://classic.freecrm.com/index.html?e=1"..................passed When I Enter valid UserName "batchautomation"...............................passed And I Enter valid PassWoard "Test@12345"....................................passed And I Click LogInButton.....................................................passed Then I am able to LogIn.....................................................passed

testcase.name: User are not able to login with invalid UsarName and valid PassWoard
testcase.system-out: Given Open Browser..........................................................passed And Enter Url "https://classic.freecrm.com/index.html?e=1"..................passed When I Enter invalid UserName "batchautomation1"............................passed And I Enter valid PassWoard "Test@123456"...................................passed And I Click LogInButton.....................................................passed Then I am not able to LogIn.................................................passed
